Verses: 1 pollaadha Manusharmel Poraamaikollaadhe; Avargalode Irukkavum Virumbaadhe.
2 avargal Irudhayam Kodumaiyai Yosikkum, Avargal Udhadugal Theevinaiyaip Pesum.
3 veedu Gnaanaththinaale Kattappattu, Vivegaththinaale Nilainiruththappadum.
4 arivinaale Araigalil Arumaiyum Inimaiyumaana Sagalavidhap Porulgalum Niraindhirukkum.
5 gnaanamullavan Belamullavan; Arivullavan Than Vallamaiyai Adhigarikkappannugiraan.
6 nalyosanai Seydhu Yuththampannu; Aalosanaikkaarar Anegaraal Jeyankidaikkum.
7 moodanukku Gnaanam Ettaadha Uyaramaayirukkum; Avan Niyaayasthalaththil Than Vaayaith Thiravaan.
8 theevinaiseyya Ubaayanseygiravan Dhushtan Ennappaduvaan.
9 theeyanokkam Paavamaam; Pariyaasakkaaran Manusharukku Aruvaruppaanavan.
10 aabaththukkaalaththil Nee Sorndhupovaayaanaal, Un Belan Kuruginadhu.
11 maranaththukku Oppikkappattavargalaiyum, Kolaiyunnappogiravargalaiyum Viduvikkakkoodumaanaal Viduvi.
12 adhai Ariyom Enbaayaagil, Irudhayangalai Sodhikkiravar Ariyaaro? Un Aaththumaavaik Kaakkiravar Gavaniyaaro? Avar Manusharukku Avanavan Kiriyaikkuththakkadhaagap Balanaliyaaro?
13 en Magane, Thenai Saappidu, Adhu Nalladhu; Koottilirundhu Ozhugum Then Un Vaaikku Inbamaayirukkum.
14 appadiye Gnaanaththai Arindhukolvadhu Un Aaththumaavukku Inbamaayirukkum; Adhaip Petrukkondaal, Adhu Mudivil Udhavum, Un Nambikkai Veenpogaadhu.
15 dhushtane, Nee Needhimaanudaiya Vaasasthalaththukku Virodhamaaip Padhiviraadhe; Avan Thangum Idaththaip Paazhaakkippodaadhe.
16 needhimaan Ezhudharam Vizhundhaalum Thirumbavum Ezhundhiruppaan; Dhunmaarkkaro Theengile Idarundu Kidappaargal.
17 un Saththuru Vizhumbodhu Sandhoshappadaadhe; Avan Idarumbodhu Un Irudhayam Kalikooraadhiruppadhaaga.
18 karththar Adhaik Kaanbaar, Adhu Avar Paarvaikkup Pollaappaayirukkum; Appozhudhu Avanidaththinindru Avar Thamadhu Kobaththai Neekkividuvaar.
19 pollaadhavargalaik Kuriththu Erichchalaagaadhe; Dhunmaarkkarmel Poraamai Kollaadhe.
20 dhunmaarkkanukku Nalmudivu Illai; Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vilakku Anaindhupom.
21 en Magane, Nee Karththarukkum Raajaavukkum Bayandhu Nada; Kalagakkaararodu Kalavaadhe.
22 sadidhiyil Avargaludaiya Aabaththu Ezhumbum; Avargal Iruvarin Sangaaraththaiyum Arindhavan Yaar?
23 pinnum Gnaanamullavargalin Buththimadhigal Ennavenil: Niyaayaththile Mugadhaatchiniyam Nalladhalla.
24 dhunmaarkkanaip Paarththu: Needhimaanaayirukkiraai Endru Sollugiravanai Janangal Sabippaargal, Prajaigal Avanai Veruppaargal.
25 avanaik Kadindhukollugiravargalmel Piriyamundaagum, Avargalukku Uththama Aaseervaadham Kidaikkum.
26 semmaiyaana Marumozhi Sollugiravan Udhadugalai Muththamidugiravanukku Samaanam.
27 veliyil Un Velaiyai Eththanappaduththi, Vayalil Adhai Ozhungaakki, Pinbu Un Veettaik Kattu.
28 niyaayamindrip Piranukku Virodhamaai Saatchiyaaga Erpadaadhe; Un Udhadugalinaal Vanjagam Pesaadhe.
29 avan Enakku Seydha Pragaaram Naanum Avanukku Seyven, Avan Seygaikkuththakkadhaaga Naanum Avanukku Sarikkattuven Endru Nee Sollaadhe.
30 somberiyin Vayalaiyum, Madhiyeenanudaiya Thraatchaththottaththaiyum Kadandhuponen.
31 idho, Adhellaam Mullukkaadaayirundhadhu; Nilaththin Mugaththaik Kaanjori Moodinadhu; Adhin Karsuvar Idindhu Kidandhadhu.
32 adhaik Kandu Sindhanaipanninen; Adhai Nokki Buththiyadaindhen.
33 innunkonjam Urangattum, Innunkonjam Kaimudakkikkondu Niththirai Seyyattum Enbaayo?
34 un Thariththiram Vazhippokkanaippolum, Un Varumai Aayudhamanindhavanaippolum Varum.
